title: What is this amazing font?
content:
I really like this font, it looks sort of like futura, but shorter. Does anyone know what it is called?

Thanks a lot!

James

[http://logopond.com/logos/rp3.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312190553/http:/logopond.com/logos/rp3.gif)

 [‹ Does anyone know what font this is??](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312190553/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42818 "Go to previous forum topic") [Ultrathin geometric sans-serif font similar to ITC Avant Garde Extra Light ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312190553/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42804 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nein

comments.content: Great! Thanks for your help and fast reply Scott.
